name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen

quotes.show: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen
quotes.quote: It doesn't make a difference whether you have a talent or not. I mean, that isn't the end goal. You have greater freedom than we do. All I have are games. But you can go anywhere and become anything.

quotes.show: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen
quotes.quote: Hope is harmony. A just heart, moving toward the light. That is all. Despair is hope's polar opposite. It is messy and confusing. Despair swallows up love, hatred, and everything else. Because not knowing where you will end up is despair. Despair is what even you cannot predict. Only despair's unpredictability will save you from a boring future.
